title: Best Teacher Ever (Encore)
description:
School is starting up again this year, even if it is from a distance. So with kids going back to school in some form across the country, it's the perfect time to go back to class with one of our favorite episodes — Nikki’s conversation with one of her best friends, who also happens to be a pretty amazing teacher.

Tell us what’s making you smile! Send a voice memo to smile@wondery.com 

Our theme song is “Smile” by Ryan Innes
